DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , study compare efficacy zotarolimus-eluting stent ( Resolute Integrity Resolute Onyx stent ) everolimus-eluting stent ( Xience Prime Xience Xpedition Xience Alpine stent ) long coronary lesion .
DOC.brief_title: LONG-DES VI ( Drug Eluting Stent Long Lesions Coronary Artery )
DOC.detailed_description: Following angiography , patient significant diameter stenosis > 50 % lesion length ( > 50mm ) require least 2 multiple long-stent placement visual estimation eligible LONG-DES VI trial inclusion exclusion criterion randomize 1:1 zotarolimus-eluting stent ( Resolute Integrity Resolute Onyx stent ) everolimus-eluting stent ( Xience Prime Xience Xpedition Xience Alpine stent ) stratify randomization method .
DOC.criteria: Age 20 year Significant native coronary artery stenosis ( > 50 % visual estimate ) lesion length 50mm , require least 2 multiple long stent placement without intervene normal segment Patients silent ischemia , stable unstable angina pectoris , NonSTelevation myocardial infarction ( NSTEMI ) The patient guardian agree study protocol schedule clinical angiographic followup , provide informed , write consent , approve appropriate Institutional Review Board/Ethical Committee respective clinical site Any contraindication follow medication : aspirin , heparin , clopidogrel , stainless steel , contrast agent , zotarolimus , everolimus An elective surgical procedure plan would necessitate interruption antiplatelet drug first 6 month post enrollment Acute STsegmentelevation MI cardiogenic shock Terminal illness life expectancy < 1 year Patients actively participate another drug device investigational study , complete primary endpoint followup period Instent restenosis target vessel ( either bare metal stent drugeluting stent segment ) However , nontarget vessel Instent restenosis permit Patients EF < 30 % Serum creatinine level > =2.0mg/dL dependence dialysis Patients leave main stem stenosis ( > 50 % visual estimate )
